transaction.compactListHint: Remove some information and reduce spacing between text to display more items in the transaction list
transaction.depositFirstHint: Deposit items are shown first (account name on the left), and withdrawal items are shown later (account name on the right)
transaction.noteBeforeBodyHint: Notes are displayed before the transaction deposit and withdrawal information

example.credit2Entertainment: Bought a PS5 and some games on Amazon as a birthday gift for my best friend
example.bank2Credit: Paid the credit card bill for a certain month, including a $200 foreign transaction fee
